713845f-a.title: Manhattan: 57th Street (East) - 3rd Avenue
713845f-a.text:
207-233 East 57th Street, north side, adjoining and east of Third Avenue. At the right is the New York Throat, Nose, and Lung Hospital. The white building at the extreme left is a branch of
the Chatham and Phenix Bank.
July 3, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.

713846f-a.title: Manhattan: 57th Street (East) - 3rd Avenue
713846f-a.text:
57th Street, north side, west from 153 East 57th Street, between Third and Lexington Avenues. At the right is the Fourth District
Magistrates' Court.
March 13, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.

708098f-a.text:
Third Avenue and N.E. corner of 57th Street.

713842f-a.title: Manhattan: 57th Street - 3rd Avenue
713842f-a.text:
57th Street at N.E. corner of Third Avenue. At the right is a
branch of the Chatham and Phenix Bank.
October 21, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.

708099f-b.title: Manhattan: 3rd Avenue - 57th Street
708099f-b.text:
Third Avenue, east side, north from 57th Street.
April 21, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, not including the corner houses at 57th Street.
April 21, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.

708099f-a.title: Manhattan: 3rd Avenue - 57th Street
708099f-a.text:
Third Avenue, east side, north from 57th Street.
April 21, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, not including the corner houses at 57th Street.
April 21, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.

708097f-a.title: Manhattan: 3rd Avenue - 57th Street (East)
708097f-a.text:
Third Ave., east side, north from but not including East 57th Street. In the background appears a portion of the 59th Street station
of the Third Ave. Elevated.
June 16, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.

713841f-a.title: Manhattan: 57th Street - 3rd Avenue
713841f-a.text:
57th Street, east from and including Third Avenue.
October 21, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
